title: 1.13（18w08b）生物骑乘生物指令
author: ir-0
txt_content:
如题
新版本的生物骑乘生物指令咋弄？

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
没变...这命令还是我刚才特意去试的
原本以为会是/summon slime{nbt}...

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
吓得我又去试了下....可以
/summon armor_stand ~ ~1 ~ {Tags:["c"],Passengers:[{id:"armor_stand",Tags:["b"],Passengers:[{id:"armor_stand",Tags:["a"]}]}]}复制代码
